name: Doom
description: Demons try to destroy Humanity, you are the only thing that can stop them

name: StarCraft2
description: Choose one of 3 factions, the stuborn Terrans, the ever evolving Zerg, or the imensly powerful Protoss and wage war

name: Titan Quest
description: Go through different Mythologies and stop the Titan Tiphon from ending the reign of the Olimpian Gods

name: Kingdoms of Amalur
description: In a world governed by fate, you are the one that has no fate, and can choose your own path

name: Halo 2
description: Humanity is under attack by an alien alliance known as The Covenant, fight back to survive

name: Age of Empires
description: Play as different civilizations and win against others as you progress through the different eras of Human history
